name: Basketball Run Finger
description:
Finger Basketball is a fun game that challenges you to score as many shots as you can! Play daily challenges and compete to climb the leaderboards!

Flick the slider with your finger or slide it forward by holding down your finger on the slider, pulling back to set the amount of power to use, and then lifting up your finger for the shot/pass. If the slider lands within range of the target, you've scored!
